Text: What propaganda...  surviving Climate Change... what a laugh.  surviving climate change is surviving United Nations communism, Carbon-Communism

Yeah, what a laugh, because unprincipled, conspiracy-believing libertarians like you were so right about all those other 'communist' conspiracies like the dangers of smoking, acid rain, CFCs and unregulated pollution by chemical companies in the '60's and '70s...


Thanks for this!
